Access to internal or third-party code r.Action: Monitor code repository access logs for successful logins and data access events by privileged accounts (e.g., matching usernames/groups from Windows Event ID 4624 of known privileged users). Compare this access to historical access patterns using descriptive statistics.

Unusual volume or pattern of data transf.Action: Analyze Zeek conn.log and http.log for connections to/from internal code repositories. Calculate the total bytes transferred per user/host over time. Identify users/hosts exhibiting unusually high data transfer volumes (e.g., using IQR or percentile analysis on byte counts) or sudden changes in activity patterns (time series analysis).
